nodes.text: Star Wars Junior was a series of children's books published by Scholastic Books in 1999 and 2000, based on the events of Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. The covers include the phrase "My First Star Wars Adventures". Much of the series adapts scenes from the film, while some books include additional, expanded scenes or completely original stories. All include original artwork.

Star Wars Jr. is a fun, character-based continuity for fans who are just starting to read, in grades K-2. Each installment will include an interactive character storybook, where young readers can accompany their favorite Episode I characters on wonderful adventures.
